participant_1.background:
I'm glad I have such fond memories of fishing with my dad.
i can t live without my friends.
i teach kindergarten.
I would not be able to be a personal trainer if I were blind because I would not be able to see my clients' form and correct them.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.

I don't let my busy schedule get in the way of my relationships with others.
mom in telecommunications.

content.text: I can't wait to go fishing with my dad this weekend.

That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could fish but I am allergic to fish. I work in a hospital during the week and pretend to be a medieval knight in the forest on the weekends. What do you do for work?
I teach kindergarten. It is a lot of fun but it can be hectic. I also have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
That's great! I don't let my busy schedule get in the way of my relationships with others either. My best friend is from Tanzania.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go to Africa. I love my friends and they're the best thing in my life.
What's your favorite color? Mine is blue.
My favorite color is also blue! I love the way it looks on me.
Me too! I also love the way it looks when it's mixed with other colors.
I agree! It's a beautiful color.
